DOC.brief_title: Study Telintra Treatment Chemotherapy Induced Neutropenia Patients With Non‑Small Cell Lung Cancer
DOC.detailed_description: TLK199.2102 multicenter Phase 2 randomize study determine effect Telintra treatment chemotherapy induce neutropenia ( CIN ) patient non small cell lung cancer receive first‑line therapy carboplatin docetaxel . After randomization , patient Treatment Arm 1 , chemotherapy carboplatin docetaxel administer Day 1 cycle , follow Telintra start dose 3000 mg total daily dose ( 1500 mg orally , twice daily ) Day 2 absolute neutrophil count improve confirm two consecutive measurement least 24 hour apart . In Treatment Arm 2 ( control arm ) , chemotherapy alone consist carboplatin docetaxel administer Day 1 cycle .
